meeting_request.purpose: Need help adjusting to college arts program and major
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Thomas, a first-year art major. I’ve been attending the University of Chicago — a highly respected arts institution with a broad arts and humanities curriculum — and I’m really enjoying my art history and studio courses, but I’m still feeling a bit lost. I’m in my first semester, and the major and major requirement are still being finalized. I don’t have a lot of art experience, and I don’t know where to fit in. I’m not a visual artist, but I’m interested in making art and want to explore that direction. I’m also taking some writing and film courses, but I’m not sure how to integrate them into my art education. I’m feeling overwhelmed and unsure if I’m on the right path, and I’m having a hard time finding a good balance between academics and my artistic interests.
